name: Same Lap Different Trap (leyli)
description:
Game made for Nordic Game Jam 2019. Compete against your friends.

Local multiplayer: 2 - 4 Players. 

Controls:

Controller: Joystick to move right and left. A/X to jump.

Keyboard:

Player 1:  "Right- & LeftArrow"to move. "UpArrow" to jump

Player 2: "A" & "D "to move. "W" to Jump.

Player 3: "J" & "L" to move. "I" to Jump.

Player 4: "Numpad6" & "Numpad4" to move. "Numpad8" to jump. 

Credits: Jacob Keller Høllund - Programming. Oliver D.J. Christensen - 3D Artist. Leyli Bunyadzade - 2D Artist. Rune Sønder - Programming. Nicklas Johansen Lið - Programming.

Sound: - Ultimate Game Music Collection (2 tracks)
